data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,690,400 citizens of the the county of Kishanganj.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kishanganj, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Kishanganj, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, help the 18,594 believers in Kishanganj to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,690,400 souls in Kishanganj and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Kishanganj access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kishanganj, Bihar, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 18,594 believers in Kishanganj, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.
